title: Pharaoh + Cleopatra

notes:
Runs perfectly!!!! While in-game we can slow down the scrolling and game run speed by opening the options and changing the values, that simple! This game is not "Borked". Also, the widescreen mode works: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=822513452
Just fallow the instructions and select the greater resolution in the menu.
